title: SMAK Penabur Kota Tangerang
description: I attended Penabur, which is a reputable high school in Indonesia. Penabur offers two specializations: social science, and natural science. From the two, I took natural science, which offers me more advanced math, physics, and gives me the oppurtunity to study chemistry.

title: SMAK Penabur Kota Tangerang - Finish
description: I finished high school smoothly in 2021.

title: Binus University (Computer Science)
description: For my undergraduate program, I chose computer science because I am interested in computers in general. Studying here, I took the general classes like "Programming in C" and "Algorithms and Programming", and also several more in-depth classes like "AI Programming" and also took a class outside my comfort zone such as "Social Media Broadcasting".

title: University of Nottingham Malaysia Campus - Study Abroad
description: During my study at Binus University, I took a program to study abroad for one semester in University of Nottingham Malaysia Campus (UNMC) for one semester. Here, I took "Computer Security", "AI Methodology", "Designing Intelligent Agent", and "Parallel Programming". Here I experienced a foreign experience as well as a different grading system, which this university uses UK grading system.

title: IPEKA Christian School
description: I took an internship program at IPEKA Christian School as a website developer. I took projects for 3 of their websites (arrowstar.org, haiguru.id, ksitangerang.id) and also other projects such as being one of the actor for Haiguru video marketing. The biggest project I took was creating a local chatbot for the 3 websites that does not require any cloud services.
